page.shortlink: api sql table import dialog function

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = The import was successful. .F. = The import was unsuccessful or user cancelled.

page.description: Display a dialog to import a SQL database to a local table.
page.discussion: The SQL_TableImportDialog() function displays the Import Table from SQL dialog, which allows you to import a table from a SQL back-end database to an Alpha Five .DBF table.
